body:
4/10 Not enough of Rinko-san.
(Rinko is the one who got me interested in the Taimanin series...before I saw her I looked at this series and was like "Meh, typical ninja girl vs perverted demons, not interested." But then I saw her and something about her piqued my interest. "Hey...she seems a bit different." She is now my favorite Taimanin girl.
